name: Duel Game
description:
A game made for the Stop Waiting For Godot game jam.

Wait until the game tells you to draw, then hit your button faster than the opponent. You lose if you hit your button too early.

Very simple because I had no ideas of what to make.

Player 1 uses A.
Player 2 uses L.
Restart with T.

Samurai asset from https://cleancutgames.itch.io/pixelart-fantasy-characters
Edo SZ font from https://www.dafont.com/edo-sz.font
